content: this adorable hat features a dinosaur chart that repeats 3 times throughout the hat it is worked in the round using the magic loop and stranded knitting technique with aran/bulky weight yarn this hat is designed to fit an older child or adult however it can be scaled down to fit a smaller child with a lighter weight yarn and smaller needle size just be sure to check your gauge in order to achieve a tighter ribbing i recommend going down one needle size during the ribbing row materials -you will need two colorways for the construction of this piece i used color 1- cascades eco+ white color 2- cascades eco+ green -size us 7 interchangeable needles -size us 8 interchangeable needles - 37- 40 in cable - optional pom pom maker -tapestry needle for weaving ends
